Detailed Description

Randomness Pool.

This class can be used to generate cryptographic quality pseudorandom bytes after seeding the pool with IncorporateEntropy()

Definition at line 12 of file randpool.h.

Member Function Documentation

unsigned int RandomNumberGenerator::GenerateBit (  )  [virtual, inherited]

generate new random bit and return it

Default implementation is to call GenerateByte() and return its lowest bit.
